title: Bug 116744 Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using the dynamic text content type, the expected behavior is not observed. The software does not apply the dynamic text content type as it should.
EB: The dynamic text content type should be applied correctly and take effect as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the software. 
2. Navigate to the settings menu or options section. 
3. Enable the dynamic text content type. 
4. Save the changes. 
5. Access any area of the software where dynamic text content should be displayed. 
6. Verify that the dynamic text content is not being applied and displayed as expected.
